Read in correlations
```{r}
pairwise_word_distance_cosines <- read_csv("/Volumes/wilbur_the_great/CONCEPTVIZ/word_distances/word_dists_by_language.csv", col_names = c("word1", "word2", "cos_dist", "lang"))

For each language pair
```{r}
m = read_feather("/Volumes/wilbur_the_great/CONCEPTVIZ/similarity_measures/HD/country_pairwise/PL_IL_sampled_distances_all_categories.feather")

m %>%
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) %>%
  group_by(category) %>%
  summarize(mean_hd_sim = mean(hd_sim)) %>%
  mutate(group = 1) %>%
  group_by(group) %>%
  multi_boot_standard(col = "mean_hd_sim")
``
